allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix SAM.gov API integration and AI evaluation pipeline

- Fix SAM.gov API: Make separate calls per NAICS code (API doesn''t support comma-separated)
- Fix SAM.gov API: Extend search window from 7 to 30 days
- Fix SAM.gov API: Remove active=true filter that was returning 0 results
- Fix OpenAI: Change model from gpt-4 to gpt-4-turbo-preview for JSON mode support
- Add fallback to evaluate existing unevaluated opportunities when discovery returns 0

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, naics_code FROM opportunities GROUP BY naics_code ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT id, name FROM companies LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*), company_id FROM evaluations GROUP BY company_id;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT email, hashed_password FROM users WHERE email=''testuser@example.com'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT naics_codes FROM companies WHERE id=''c4cf75a7-a599-441e-a528-f0281f4142cb'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opportunities WHERE naics_code IN (''541512'', ''541511'') AND status = ''active'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT attachments FROM opportunities WHERE attachments IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, recommendation FROM evaluations WHERE company_id=''c4cf75a7-a599-441e-a528-f0281f4142cb'' GROUP BY recommendation;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations WHERE company_id=''c4cf75a7-a599-441e-a528-f0281f4142cb'';")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT email, first_name FROM users LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "UPDATE users SET email_verified = true WHERE email = ''demo@govai.com''; SELECT email, email_verified FROM users WHERE email = ''demo@govai.com'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_evaluations, COUNT(DISTINCT opportunity_id) as unique_opportunities, COUNT(DISTINCT company_id) as unique_companies FROM evaluations;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='SamGovDev2024Secure' psql -h betehomes-prod.czjyhxu2w9yy.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U sam_gov_dev_user -d sam_gov_dev -c "
SELECT u.email, c.id as company_id, c.name as company_name, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations WHERE company_id = c.id) as evaluation_count
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN companies c ON c.user_id = u.id 
WHERE u.email = ''demo@govai.com'';
")
